rename_steps_for_metaflow[source]

rename_steps_for_metaflow(steps)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
steps = extract_steps(test_module)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
no_steps = extract_steps(os.path.join(Config().path("lib_path"), f"_nbdev.py"))
assert len(no_steps) == 0
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert ["first", "preprocess", "train", "last"] == [step.name for step in steps]
rename_steps_for_metaflow(steps)
assert ["start", "preprocess", "train", "end"] == [step.name for step in steps]

indent_multiline[source]

indent_multiline(multiline_text, indent=1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
text = """
Some text
:param param: text
"""
assert '    """Some text\n    :param param: text"""' == indent_multiline(text)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
nb_path = Path(os.path.join("test", "test_top2vec.ipynb"))
nb = read_nb(nb_path)
module_name = find_default_export(nb["cells"]).replace(".", "/")
test_module = os.path.join(Config().path("lib_path"), f"{module_name}.py")
steps = extract_steps(test_module)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
steps[1]

FuncDetails(name='preprocess', docstring=None, args='dremio_access,model_level,min_date,traffic_percent', has_return=True, return_stmt='documents', code='\n\ndef preprocess(dremio_access, model_level, min_date, traffic_percent):\n    data = get_utterances(dremio_access, model_level, min_date, traffic_percent)\n    button_filter = get_button_responses_filter(dremio_access)\n    user_texts = data[~data.Utterance.isin(button_filter)].copy()\n    documents = user_texts.Utterance.tolist()\n    return documents\n\n')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
